heading: Diablo 4 2.3.1 Patch Notes â€“ July 15th
content: Discover the next Diablo 4 update for Season 9: Sins of the Horadrim! Read the 2.3.1 Patch Notes to learn everything coming! Aspect of Pestilence Razor Wings Battle Trance Double Swing Hammer of the Ancients Barbed Carapace Greatstaff of the Crone Hulking Monstrosity Passive Deathmask of Nirmitruq Breakneck Bandit's Aspect Aspect of Frozen Orbit Aspect of Frozen Memories We hope you enjoy the Sins of the Horadrim Season with the aid of our Season 9 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 9 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes.
